page.title: 12A Dockland Visit (part 1)
page.content: {The Headland-H/pool By Nicola Parvin {and By Christopher Hill To-day we went to the H/pool Docks for a look round.First we looked at the { {Warrior}which is being restored in the Coal Dock.The{Warrior}was an original {iron-clad battle-ship.}On the bow of the{Warrior}was a Roman figure-head and on the sides were some cannons and a big,heavy anchor.Then we went over a bridge that used to open up to let boats go past.Beside the bridge there were lots of sprats darting about in the water.After that we crossed a turning bridge to look at the big cranes and the scrap metal.Then we went to look at the Vauxhall{cars that {were imported from Germany,}and we saw how the cars were washed.We then saw a big building called{T.S.Abdiel}that is used to train sea cadets to be sailors.
